title: PHP PDO Driver for Snowflake release notes for 2022 | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This article contains the release notes for the PHP PDO Driver for Snowflake, including the following when applicable:
For release note information for versions released prior to January 2022, see the Client Release History.
See PHP PDO Driver for Snowflake for documentation.
Added new proxy and no_proxy connection settings.
Fixed an issue with key pair authentication.
Fixed an issue that caused autocommit to turn over when creating a connection with options.
Fixed an issue related to loading the PHP driver with php-fpm.
Updated documentation to update the supported PHP versions.
